title: Launcher is tearing, laggs the whole computer.
body:
Hello everyone !
When i start the launcher it starts to lagg even I patch or not. After i click "Play" it becomes good, but it's really annoying and i cant even listen to music beacuse it tears/laggs too.
I reinstalled the game yet it's the same.
Any ideas ? :(

replies.body: Is this happening with the Alpha Client or the regular (air) client?
